name: Mage Game
description:
A simple roguelike-like game with a simple procedural maze generator.

You control a mage - whether he is escaping or exploring some weird dungeon, I still don't know. You must find the key that opens the door to the next level while avoiding (and throwing fireballs at) some creepy creatures.

Credits: programming, arts and music made by Vinicius Osti.

Sound effects from RPG Maker VX Ace RTP (with some modifications)
